The Gaviota Region Interactive Planner allows you to [**visualize the degree of overlap of natural resources**]{.underline}. We have created a score running from 0 to 1 where higher values indicate higher resources availability---[**darker areas on the map indicate higher abundance of the aggregated resources you select.**]{.underline}

To customize the map and display where the resources you prioritize concentrate, you can toggle between different options.

[**Follow the tour to see what you can do.**]{.underline}
